item.title: Shoulder & Arm
item.description: This is a shoulder and arm routine.
item.text: Shoulder overhead press Shoulder press Delicate rudar work Machine biceps curl Dips

item.title: Upper chest & Arms
item.description: This is a routine for upper chest and arms.
item.text: Incline bench press Biceps curl Triceps work Military press Dips

item.title: Back & Triceps
item.description: This is a back routine with a little bit of triceps.
item.text: Close grip bench press Hammer machine Straight arms pull over Row Close grip triceps extension

item.title: Upper body full routine
item.description: This is a routine for full body workout
item.text: Front pull & neck pull Close grip bench press Barbell high row Barbell biceps curl Decline dumbell bench press Shrugs
